error.upload-photo-lbl: Sorry, an error occurred uploading that photo.

dialogs.confirm-photo-delete: Are you sure you want to remove this photo?

general.heading: Sketch key points for the following:

help.intro: As an artist you can now live stream your own unique perspective in a sketch. Tap anywhere to view current areas you can sketch on...
help.item: This area groups a collection of topics together you can create sketches and artwork for. Tap to get started!

pay.desc: Stream your sketched points to an unlimited audience!
pay.why1: Enhance the events you attend by providing your own artistic perspective.
pay.why2: Promote your skills by entertaining others.
pay.why3: Earn money as an artist by receiving donations from viewers that love your sketches.

user.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
user.name: Name

purchase.failed-android-txt:
Something went wrong. Please make sure that:

You are connected to the internet.
Google Play is downloaded and up to date.
purchase.failed-ios-txt:
Something went wrong. Please make sure that:

You are connected to the internet.
App store is downloaded and up to date.
purchase.not-restored-android-txt:
Looks like we failed to restore your purchases. This could mean: 

You aren't connected to the internet.
You need to download or update your Google Play store.
purchase.not-restored-ios-txt:
Looks like we failed to restore your purchases. This could mean: 

You aren't connected to the internet.
You need to download or update your app store.
purchase.previous-lbl: We need to check if you've made any iTunes purchases for this year that have not yet been applied to your account.
purchase.restored-lbl: All valid purchases have been restored, hooray!
